title: Unable to build adapter-static when using grouped route
body:
### Describe the bug

I tried to use completely different layout for a route, but since named layout is deprecated, sveltekit force to use group, I use it like this.

src/routes/
├ (admin)
│ ├ +page.svelte
│ └ +layout.svelte
├ (app)
│ ├ +page.svelte
│ └ +layout.svelte

But adapter-static throw an error when build, Encountered dynamic routes. Am I doing something wrong?

### Reproduction

[my-app.zip](https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/files/9462715/my-app.zip)

```
npm i
npm run build
```

### Logs

```shell
> Using @sveltejs/adapter-static
  @sveltejs/adapter-static: cannot have dynamic routes unless using the 'fallback' option. See https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/tree/master/packages/adapter-static#spa-mode for more information
    - src/routes/(app)
error during build:
Error: Encountered dynamic routes
```
